name: Mushroom Pants
description:
## Mushroom Pants

Keep it practical and stylish with these sturdy and reliable mushroom pants that are perfect for exploring the woods and foraging for mushrooms.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
[Bumpkins](https://docs.bumpkins.io/getting-started/about)
